changeSet.author: Binh Vu
changeSet.comment: Add new property original_entity_types to entity nodes. This is to help with deleting global inclusion, to avoid deleting a real relationship. The reason for this was because during testing, a global inclusion was mistakenly added as a certain type, resulting in a node with two type, one real and one fake. This means that node now returns back as a synonym for both types.

customChange.query: CALL apoc.periodic.iterate( 'MATCH (n:Taxonomy) WHERE NOT exists(n.original_entity_types) RETURN n LIMIT 500000', 'SET n.original_entity_types = ["Taxonomy"]', {batchSize:50000})
customChange.conditionQuery: MATCH (n:Taxonomy) WHERE NOT exists(n.original_entity_types) RETURN COUNT(n)
